CustomMetadata.label: Parent/Guardian Waiver and Release of Li

values.value:
This waiver and release of liability (“Waiver”) are made on behalf of {{FirstName}} {{LastName}} (“Minor Volunteer”) in favor of Common-Unite, a Missouri non-profit corporation (“Organization”).


Purpose of Volunteer Services: The Minor Volunteer is participating in activities as a volunteer for the Organization and acknowledges that the Volunteer Services may include, but are not limited to, the following tasks: Manual Labor and Office Support.


Release of Liability: The Parent/Guardian acknowledges that the Volunteer Services may involve certain risks, including but not limited to physical or emotional injury, property damage, or death, and the Parent/Guardian assumes all such risks on behalf of the Minor Volunteer. The Parent/Guardian agrees to hold harmless, release, indemnify, and defend the Organization, its officers, directors, employees, agents, and representatives (collectively, the “Released Parties”) from and against any and all claims, demands, damages, costs, expenses, and liability of any kind arising out of or in connection with the Minor Volunteer’s participation in the Volunteer Services, including but not limited to any injury or damage to the Minor Volunteer or the Minor Volunteer’s property.


Medical Treatment: The Parent/Guardian hereby grants permission to the Organization to authorize and obtain any medical treatment deemed necessary for the Minor Volunteer in the event of an emergency arising during the Minor Volunteer’s participation in the Volunteer Services. The Parent/Guardian acknowledges that the Organization is not responsible for the payment of any medical treatment or related expenses.


Photographic Release: The Parent/Guardian grants to the Organization the right to use and publish photographs of the Minor Volunteer, or in which the Minor Volunteer may be included, for editorial, trade, advertising, and any other purpose and in any manner and medium; to alter the same without restriction; and to copyright the same. The Parent/Guardian hereby releases the Organization and its legal representatives and assigns from all claims and liability relating to said photographs.


Governing Law: This Waiver shall be governed by the laws of the state of Missouri.


Entire Agreement: This Waiver constitutes the entire agreement between the parties and supersedes all prior negotiations, understandings, and agreements, whether written or oral.


Amendments: This Waiver may not be amended except in writing, signed by both the Parent/Guardian and the Organization.
Parent/Guardian Waiver and Release of Liability for Minor Volunteer
